extendedInfo.description: What is Earbits?Earbits makes it dead simple for artists and music lovers to find each other, and create meaningful connections. Our team of experts brings you the best independent music from around the world, hand-curated and served up hot.  But thatâs not all.  Earbits for Android analyzes the music from your phone and recommends channels youâll like from over 350 genre-based selections, then we intelligently blend your own music into those channels. The result is awesome music discovery with your favorite tracks mixed in.It gets better.  On Earbits, you won't find commercials. You won't find unrelated ads. And you won't find subscription fees.You are also unlikely to find the Top 40 music that you can get everywhere else. That's not what we do. Our job is to showcase high quality music and bring you and our artists closer together.Does that mean I won't hear anybody popular?We're glad you asked. We said it would be independent, but trust us, there's plenty of heavyweights. You'll find Primus, Widespread Panic, My Morning Jacket and other awesome musicians with strong followings. But you'll really know what Earbits is all about when your ears perk up to the sounds of Jesse Thomas, Sister Sparrow & the Dirty Birds, Rosie and Me, or Ivory Drive. If you have never heard these incredible artists, you deserve a better music experience.How can you have no ads, no commercials, and no subscriptions, and still keep the lights on?The reason that Earbits can have no ads, commercials or fees is because our "advertisers" aren't your normal radio sponsors. We never got into this to use our bands' music to sell cars and fast food, which is why you won't find those sponsors on our site.We want be the most effective platform for helping high quality independent bands find new fans and turn them into customers. What that means is that the bands are our customers and clients. Rather than doing everything we can to take the focus off of our bands and put it on our corporate sponsors, some of our artists pay for sleeker profiles and increased exposure, and we focus on building tools that help them get real, sustainable value.One way weâve done that is with Grooviesâ¢, the first social currency designed to let users pay for streaming music by taking actions that give value back to artists and record labels.Groovies are a fun and easy way for our users to earn credits for supporting artists. Whether youâre spreading the word about an artist through social sharing, or checking into a live show (coming soon!), if youâre supporting the artists, youâre earning Groovies. Then, you use Groovies to access unlimited on-demand music and Groovie rewards.Simply put, Groovies are the currency thatâs going to change the way people access and pay for music, and itâs going to create massive, sustainable careers for thousands of musicians.So, come on!  Give Earbits for Android a try.(Similar to: Pandora, Last.fm, Spotify, Rdio, Rhapsody, MOG, Turntable.fm, iTunes, iHeartRadio, Songza, 8tracks)You'll love us if you're looking for: free music, commercial free radio, music apps, radio apps, independent music, music discovery, and more.

reviews.title: Great music
reviews.comment: Found this first on my roku and runit all the time for the house music.  Just loaded the app and happy i can take this on the road.  Would love to be able to track my favorite artists and play more of their songs on demand.  Good work guys
reviews.author: Ray Jolicoeur

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Took over the native player hardware control buttons, then it crashed, but not without freezing the entire phone.  Edit: Thanks for quick response Earbits team. That was the only issue (happened twice), but other than that, this app is awesome in terms of playing new music you want to listen to (beats Spotify, Pandora radio, etc.)
reviews.author: Kevin Yun

reviews.title: Facebook login only?  Come on!
reviews.comment: I don\'t have Facebook so there\'s no way for me to enjoy the app fully...  Apart from this,  great recommandations.
reviews.author: Etienne Houde

reviews.title: No network connection
reviews.comment: Good app! (: but the second time I started it, it says no network connection although I\'m connected to WiFi or data. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling it but still won\'t work. Help?
reviews.author: Reubs ster

reviews.title: I love this app but...
reviews.comment: I have a question. On my Roku box, how do I find Christian Hip Hop
reviews.author: Carnell Turner

reviews.title: Good App-New Music
reviews.comment: I enjoy hearing new artists.  Sometimes I wonder why I am listening to some who don\'t seem to fit my taste.    I also wonder, how do you turn the app off?  I seem to only be able to do it by pausing the music before I go to my home screen.  I want a way to exit the app when I want to.  Galaxy S3.
reviews.author: Robert Largent

reviews.title: Great discovery app, a little buggy
reviews.comment: I love every musical and interface aspect of this app. Very intuitive. Usually doesn\'t successfully stream for me for more than about 8 songs -  starts to lag, long pauses between and within tracks. Also hard to quit out to the point that there\'s no longer the alert or the player on the idle screen. Doesn\'t seem to affect overall performance, though - just an OCD thing.
reviews.author: Denali Smith

reviews.title: great app!
reviews.comment: nice concept with good interface, but my Facebook login seems get stuck for me, the loading animation stays. The window also close immediately after poping out after clicking the connect button for browser version
reviews.author: Vincent Tse

reviews.title: Good Start - Needs More
reviews.comment: Found out about Earbits from WebAppStorm. I like it a lot, but it needs a few more things. One, a sign on that is non Facebook. Two, a landscape mode (I use a tablet that I also write with, so I am in landscape 90% of the time). Three, a way to switch channels via the notification bar.
reviews.author: Raymond Duke

reviews.title: Great App! Addt\'l feature needed.
reviews.comment: Great app that analyzes your music, makes recommendations & has a broad channel set. For the developers; 5th star for addition of a widget. Overall great work! UPDATE: found with slide right-left; now playing & band info! Nice! *1 more suggestion: App stops playing on notifications/calls... would be nice to have pause/resume function!
reviews.author: C.A. Carpenter

reviews.title: Great concept
reviews.comment: The app cant seem to analyze the music that I already have on my Nexus 7. It lists it under artists, but doesnt seem to do much else with it.
reviews.author: Vivek Wali

reviews.title: Clean interface.wow streaming
reviews.comment: I just want to say great and mind boggling app.thanks to the dev for such a clean ui fast and cool too.
reviews.author: sank aditya

reviews.title: Wonderful App, Local music dilemma
reviews.comment: I really love this app and how commercial free it is compared to others.  The only problem I have right now is playing my currently loaded music; when ever i try to play the music I already have, the app plays it as an entirely different song and is listed under a different artist name. Can that be fixed some time soon??
reviews.author: Toby K

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: Once you favorite something you can\'t undo it. HTC One X
reviews.author: K K

reviews.title: Chiptunes!
reviews.comment: The wide variety is crazy. I am very pleased to find a chiptune station.
reviews.author: Trent Murray

reviews.title: Almost fantastic
reviews.comment: I love the idea of this app and it looks great but it requires Facebook in order to save any songs you hear and that completely killed it for me unfortunately. Would love to use it once that requirement is gone.
reviews.author: Dion Henare

reviews.title: SGN2
reviews.comment: I love it so far. Please add other social networks besides of Fb.
reviews.author: Lucio Solis

reviews.title: Nice selection, disappointing app
reviews.comment: It appears to have a wide variety of independent artists and great music! Two things I would recommend: 1. Have a feature where you can search for or add a specific artist to favorites. 2. Don\'t make it an obligation to have a Facebook in order to save songs. This made me miss out on \"Favoriting\" an artist and discovering more of their music.        UPDATE: Uses too much RAM, which is pretty inconvenient. (Android 2.3.6, LG Optimus M)
reviews.author: Leanne Stray

reviews.title: Can Be Linked To Web Version?
reviews.comment: Is a great place/app - for all types of music. Am wondering if is possible to see the channels I created on desktop in the mobile version. Please do it if not already possible. Plenty of music. Endless entertainment. Love this app.
reviews.author: Arun Kumar

reviews.comment: It\'s nice but spends to much data.
